name: IDwall Technology LTDA
description: Developer of an identity verification platform designed to improve user authentication and fraudulent detection. The company's platform extracts data from document images and checks whether the data and users' faces match the public source in real-time, enabling businesses to verify their customers' data in sign-ups and purchases and operate safely.
one_liner: Developer of an identity verification platform designed to improve user authentication and fraudulent detection. The company's platform extracts data from document images and checks whether the data and users' faces match the public source in real-time, enabling businesses to verify their customers' data in sign-ups and purchases and operate safely.
